languages.text: После смены власти в Адептус Арбитес Соломон вернулся в их ряды, где прослужил до конца своей жизни. Непреклонному и неподкупному Соломону трижды предлагали пост маршала Арбитес и трижды он отказывался. К концу жизни простой проктор Антар обладал авторитетом, превышающим таковой у всех вышестоящих офицеров. Вероятно, это и послужило причиной последнего, успешного покушения на его жизнь.
languages.translation_comment: Соломон догматик не стал маршалом, арбитров не разогнали
Соломон догматик не стал маршалом, арбитров не разогнали

languages.text: Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites Marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble Proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.
languages.original_text: После смены власти в Адептус Арбитес Соломон вернулся в их ряды, где прослужил до конца своей жизни. Непреклонному и неподкупному Соломону трижды предлагали пост маршала Арбитес и трижды он отказывался. К концу жизни простой проктор Антар обладал авторитетом, превышающим таковой у всех вышестоящих офицеров. Вероятно, это и послужило причиной последнего, успешного покушения на его жизнь.

traits.locale_text: Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks and served there for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites marshal, and he refused each time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, a humble proctor, wielded an authority that surpassed that of all his superior officers. That was likely the reason for the final attempt on his life, the one that succeeded.

Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks and served there for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites marshal, and he refused each time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, a humble proctor, wielded an authority that surpassed that of all his superior officers. That was likely the reason for the final attempt on his life, the one that succeeded.

Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.

Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.

Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites Marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble Proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.

Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites Marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble Proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.

languages.text: Nach dem Machtwechsel bei den Adeptus Arbites schloss Solomorne sich ihnen wieder an und blieb den Rest seines Lebens in ihren Diensten. Der unversöhnliche und unbestechliche Solomorne erhielt dreimal das Angebot, Arbites-Marschall zu werden, und lehnte jedes Mal ab. Gegen Ende seines Lebens wurde Anthar, obwohl noch immer ein demütiger Proktor, eine Autorität zugemessen, die jene all seiner vorgesetzten Offiziere überstieg. Wahrscheinlich war das auch der Grund für den letzten – und einzigen erfolgreichen – Anschlag auf sein Leben.
languages.original_text: Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites Marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble Proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.

traits.locale_text: Nach dem Machtwechsel bei den Adeptus Arbites schloss Solomorne sich ihnen wieder an und blieb den Rest seines Lebens in ihren Diensten. Der unversöhnliche und unbestechliche Solomorne erhielt dreimal das Angebot, Arbites-Marschall zu werden, und lehnte jedes Mal ab. Gegen Ende seines Lebens wurde Anthar, obwohl noch immer ein demütiger Proktor, eine Autorität zugemessen, die jene all seiner vorgesetzten Offiziere überstieg. Wahrscheinlich war das auch der Grund für den letzten – und einzigen erfolgreichen – Anschlag auf sein Leben.

languages.text: Après le changement de pouvoir, Solomorne se joignit à l'Adeptus Arbites, à laquelle il consacra le reste de sa vie. Implacable, incorruptible, Solomorne se vit offrir à trois reprises le poste de maréchal, et par trois fois le refusa. Vers la fin de sa vie, Anthar, bien que simple proctor, exerçait une autorité surpassant de loin celle de tous ses officiers supérieurs. Dès lors, inutile de s'interroger sur la raison de l'ultime tentative d'assassinat dont il fut victime, la seule à avoir réussi.
languages.original_text: Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites Marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble Proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.

traits.locale_text: Après le changement de pouvoir, Solomorne se joignit à l'Adeptus Arbites, à laquelle il consacra le reste de sa vie. Implacable, incorruptible, Solomorne se vit offrir à trois reprises le poste de maréchal, et par trois fois le refusa. Vers la fin de sa vie, Anthar, bien que simple proctor, exerçait une autorité surpassant de loin celle de tous ses officiers supérieurs. Dès lors, inutile de s'interroger sur la raison de l'ultime tentative d'assassinat dont il fut victime, la seule à avoir réussi.

languages.text: 法务部的权力交接结束之后，索罗蒙再次成为了法务部成员，在那里度过了余生。索罗蒙一生从未犯下过任何污点，尽管法务部三次邀请他担任元帅一职，但他每次都拒绝了。在人生最后这段时光，尽管他依然是位普通的监察官，但他的威望却超过了所有上级官员。或许正因如此，有人打算除掉这颗眼中钉，而最后这次暗杀成功了。
languages.original_text: Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites Marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble Proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.

traits.locale_text: 法务部的权力交接结束之后，索罗蒙再次成为了法务部成员，在那里度过了余生。索罗蒙一生从未犯下过任何污点，尽管法务部三次邀请他担任元帅一职，但他每次都拒绝了。在人生最后这段时光，尽管他依然是位普通的监察官，但他的威望却超过了所有上级官员。或许正因如此，有人打算除掉这颗眼中钉，而最后这次暗杀成功了。

languages.text: Tras la transición de poder en el Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne volvió a sus filas, y permaneció en el servicio durante el resto de su vida. Implacable e incorruptible, a Solomorne se le ofreció en tres ocasiones el puesto de Mariscal del Arbites, pero se negó en todas ellas. Hacia el final de su vida, Anthar, aún un humilde Procurador, tenía más autoridad que ninguno de sus superiores. Probablemente, eso fuera lo que provocara el último intento de asesinato, que se cobró su vida.
languages.original_text: Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites Marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble Proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.

traits.locale_text: Tras la transición de poder en el Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne volvió a sus filas, y permaneció en el servicio durante el resto de su vida. Implacable e incorruptible, a Solomorne se le ofreció en tres ocasiones el puesto de Mariscal del Arbites, pero se negó en todas ellas. Hacia el final de su vida, Anthar, aún un humilde Procurador, tenía más autoridad que ninguno de sus superiores. Probablemente, eso fuera lo que provocara el último intento de asesinato, que se cobró su vida.

languages.text: 高等裁定局での権力の移行の後、ソロモーンは再びその隊列に加わり、生涯を通じてその職務に仕え続けた。断固として揺るがず、決して腐敗しなかった彼は、高等裁定局の将帥の地位を三度にわたって打診されたが、いずれも辞退している。晩年、アンサールは肩書きこそ謙虚な代理人のままであったが、その影響力はすべての上官を凌ぐほどであった。これが、最後の、そして唯一成功した彼の命を狙う企ての動機であったと考えられている。
languages.original_text: Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites Marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble Proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.

traits.locale_text: 高等裁定局での権力の移行の後、ソロモーンは再びその隊列に加わり、生涯を通じてその職務に仕え続けた。断固として揺るがず、決して腐敗しなかった彼は、高等裁定局の将帥の地位を三度にわたって打診されたが、いずれも辞退している。晩年、アンサールは肩書きこそ謙虚な代理人のままであったが、その影響力はすべての上官を凌ぐほどであった。これが、最後の、そして唯一成功した彼の命を狙う企ての動機であったと考えられている。

languages.text: Adeptus Arbites'teki güç devrinin ardından Solomorne, saflara yeniden katıldı ve hayatının geri kalanında buradaki hizmetini sürdürdü. Boyun eğmez ve yolsuzluğa bulaşmaz Solomorne'a üç kez Arbites Miralaylığı makamı teklif edildi ancak Solomorne, her seferinde bu teklifi geri çevirdi. Anthar, hayatının sonlarına yaklaşırken hâlâ naçizane bir Üsteğmen olmasına rağmen kendinden daha yüksek rütbeye sahip subayları aşan bir otoriteye sahipti. Hayatına kasteden son ve tek başarılı suikast girişiminin nedeni de muhtemelen buydu.
languages.original_text: Following the transition of power at the Adeptus Arbites, Solomorne rejoined its ranks, where he remained in service for the rest of his life. Implacable and incorruptible, Solomorne was thrice offered the position of an Arbites Marshal, which he refused every time. Toward the end of his life, Anthar, though still a humble Proctor, wielded an authority surpassing that of all his superior officers. This was likely the reason for the final — and the only successful — attempt on his life.

traits.locale_text: Adeptus Arbites'teki güç naklinin ardından Solomorne, saflarına yeniden katıldı ve hayatının geri kalanında buradaki hizmetini sürdürdü. Boyun eğmez ve yolsuzluğa bulaşmaz Solomorne'a üç kez Arbites Miralaylığı pozisyonu teklif edildi ancak Solomorne her seferinde bu teklifi geri çevirdi. Anthar, hayatının sonlarına yaklaşırken hâlâ naçizane bir Üsteğmen olmasına rağmen kendinden daha yüksek rütbeye sahip subayları aşan bir otoriteye sahipti. Hayatına kasteden son ve tek başarılı suikast girişiminin nedeni de muhtemelen buydu.
